sentences.sContent: Zhao magenta team has asked him to do things the first commercial thinking.
sentences.sContent_eng: Zhao magenta team has asked him to do things the first commercial thinking.
sentences.sCn: 赵品红一直要求他的团队做事首先进行商业思考。

sentences.sContent: In order for the technique to function for the standardized process colors cyan, magenta and yellow as well, densitometers have color filters for the complementary colors.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order for the technique to function for the standardized process colors cyan, magenta and yellow as well, densitometers have color filters for the complementary colors.
sentences.sCn: 为使这项技术能应用于标准程序的青绿、品红以及黄色，光密度计有彩色滤光片处理互补色；

synos.tran: [染料]品红；洋红；红色苯胺染料
洋红色的；[染料]品红色的
